column2: The charts of the major equity indexes and market breadth have yet to send a glimmer that the worst might be over. One ray of hope regarding the charts, may come from the fact that the vast majority made higher intraday lows Thursday versus Monday's deep selloff lows. All the major equity indexes closed lower Thursday with negative internals on lighter volume on the NYSE and Nasdaq.
column4: 5 Reasons Why We Expect a Relief Rally Is on the Way
